text: We managed to create this using UI extension. Here is how it looks like.
This will read the event id and direct me to an index page based on which record i pressed the link from

How would you guys/gals recommend handling 2 openIframeModal calls? The first one is obvious, but when it comes to the second I have to wait for specific data to be processed before that modal automatically opens. I can't prevent them from closing out the first iframe until the data has been inserted into a HubSpot property that's required for the second iframe to load, so that's out of the question. Not sure what the best way to handle this one is.

So a custom form is submitted which exists as a card
While that's submitting, the first iframe opens which has a sales rep schedule a meeting
Once the meeting is scheduled, they close that iframe.
If they waited long enough to close the iframe, then the second iframe should open right up.
If they closed the first iframe to quickly while data is being submitted via the API through a serverless function in the background, then the iframe can't be opened because I can't construct the URL yet.
